node.title: Helicopter heading to rescue Perth family stranded in Simpson Desert
node.alt: Perth couple Ori and Lindsey Zavros with their children.
node.description: A police helicopter is on its way to rescue the Zavros family, who have been stranded in the Simpson Desert in the remote South Australian outback since their campervan became bogged late last week.
node.content:
["A police helicopter is on its way to rescue a Perth family of four, who have been stranded in the Simpson Desert in the remote South Australian outback since late last week.", "SA Police told ABC News the helicopter left this morning to rescue the Zavros family from the remote location in South Australia's far north.", "The helicopter has\u00a0a paramedic\u00a0on board and the four-member family will be\u00a0brought back to the Olympic Dam airport.", "Perth couple Ori and Lindsey Zavros, and their two young children Zane and Zoe, got stuck\u00a0when their\u00a0customised campervan became\u00a0bogged\u00a0following torrential rain.", "Ori's mother, Theo Zavros, said the family had \"had enough\" of being stuck in the desert and having to conserve water ahead of forecast hot weather.", "She said everyone involved in the rescue operation had been \"brilliant\".", "She said she was especially looking forward to speaking to Zoe.", "\"We understand the three-year-old was a little bit sensitive to everything so I can't wait to speak to her \u2014 basically to speak to all of them,\" she said.", "", "
The Zavros family's four-wheel drive campervan that is stuck in the Simpson Desert.(Australian Maritime Safety Authority)
", "Oodnadatta Pink Roadhouse owner Peter Moore said he had been informed by local police early this morning that a retrieval operation was underway.", "\"The local police came this morning and said that drum of avgas we got dropped off here two days ago \u2026 is required for the chopper coming up from Adelaide,\" he said.", "\"[It's] landing here, refuelling, going into the desert to pick up the stranded family and then take them back down south.\"", "The helicopter left Port Augusta about 10am ACDT and is expected to reach the scene \u2014\u00a0about 150 kilometres north-east of Oodnadatta \u2014\u00a0about midday.", "Their van will be left in place, police said.", "
Concern about hot weather
", "With temperatures expected to rise above 40 degrees Celsius in coming days, Mr Moore said the looming heat was potentially a factor in the decision to retrieve the family.", "\"I could well imagine that it would be, for sure. Oodnadatta is still the hottest, driest town in Australia,\" he said.", "\"There's an airstrip not that far away but I would imagine the chopper would land right near them.\"", "The family\u00a0has\u00a0a satellite phone, and the Australian Maritime Safety Authority (AMSA) on Sunday\u00a0conducted a\u00a0second aerial\u00a0drop of emergency supplies.", "", "
The family is well stocked with supplies in their campervan.(Supplied: Australian Maritime Safety Authority)
", "Theo Zavros yesterday told ABC Radio Perth that her main concern was\u00a0the changing weather.", "\"We're a little bit concerned because, we are told, the next couple of days are going to be over 38 degrees,\" she said.", "\"When they were bogged, they had food for the next four days, which was good enough.", "\"They were hoping that another traveller would go by and be able to help them, but obviously not so.\"", "Mt Dare Hotel owner Sandra Scott \u2014 who is about 80 kilometres from the family's location \u2014 said roads in the area remained closed because of flooding.", "\"They certainly won't be able to [get] the truck out,\" she said.", "\"That'll have to stay there until the roads are passable. [It] could be another 10 days.\""]
